maml:description.maml:para: Retrieve the object representing the Team.

maml:Description.maml:para: The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The Team Project Name where the Team belongs.
The name of the team to be retrieved.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.
The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The Team Project Name where the Team belongs.
The name of the team to be retrieved.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.

maml:description.maml:para: Gets the settings of the team: BacklogIterationPath, CurrentIteratinPath, IterationPaths, TeamField, etc (https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.teamfoundation.processconfiguration.client(v=vs.110).aspx)

maml:Description.maml:para: The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The object representing the Team. You can use Get-Team to retrieve this object.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.
The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The object representing the Team. You can use Get-Team to retrieve this object.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.

maml:Description.maml:para: The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The Team Project name where the new area will belong.
The name of the area.
The parent area path, if exists, from the team project name, including '\'. Ex: If the parent area path is '\TeamProjectName\MyParentArea' so you have to inform '\MyParentArea'.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.
The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.

An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.

The name os the Team Project where the area belongs.
Area path from the team project name. Ex.: being area path 'teamproject\area\sub-are'a so you have to inform '\area\sub-area'.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.

maml:description.maml:para: Sets the default Area and Iteration for a Team.

maml:Description.maml:para: The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The TeamFoundatinTeam object that represents a team. Can be retrieved by the function Get-Team.
The full iteration path (including the team project). Ex.: "\TeamProjectName\IterationPath"
The full area path (including the team project). Ex.: "\TeamProjectName\AreaPath"
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.

The full area path (including the team project). Ex.: "\TeamProjectName\AreaPath"
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.

maml:description.maml:para: Set the Team Settings for a Team.

Sets the settings of the team: BacklogIterationPath, CurrentIteratinPath, IterationPaths, TeamField, etc (https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.teamfoundation.processconfiguration.client(v=vs.110).aspx)

maml:Description.maml:para: The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The guid that identifies the Team. Can be retrieved by the fuction Get-Team.
The TeamSettings object with the setting to be set for the Team.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.
The TeamProjectCollection URL. Ex.: https://tfs2015.local/tfs/defaultcollection. Note: if the 'Tfs' parameter was informed, this parameter will be ignored.
The guid that identifies the Team. Can be retrieved by the fuction Get-Team.
The TeamSettings object with the setting to be set for the Team.
An instance of the object TfsTeamProjectCollection, that represents a TeamProjectCollection. If informed the CollectionUrl will be ignored.
